invalidStructuredOutput: The model returned content which is incomplete or invalid and cannot be parsed. Try using a bigger or "smarter" model.

index.projectDescription:
This is a web UI for {0} that allows AI to search online and dig deeper on its own based on specific questions, and then output a research report.
This project features streaming AI responses for realtime feedback, and visualization of the research process using a tree structure.
All API requests are directly sent from your browser. No remote data stored.
index.missingConfigDescription: This project requires you to bring your own API keys.

settings.title: Settings
settings.disclaimer: Settings are stored locally in your browser.

ai.contextSizeHelp: The maximum size of the context in tokens. This is the maximum number of tokens that will be sent to the model. The default is 128,000 tokens.

openaiCompatible.title: OpenAI Compatible
openaiCompatible.description: Currently only supports OpenAI compatible providers, e.g. Gemini, Together AI, DeepSeek, SiliconCloud, ...

webSearch.providerHelp:
Currently only supports Tavily. It provides lots of free quota (1000 credits / month).
Get one API key at {0}.
webSearch.queryLanguageHelp:
The language of the search query. Useful if you want to get search results in a different language.
When writing conclusions, the AI model will still use the language same as the web UI.

researchTopic.title: 1. Research Topic
researchTopic.numOfQuestionsHelp: The number of follow-up questions to clarify.
researchTopic.breadthHelp: Number of searches in the first iteration. The search width of each iteration is half of the previous one.

modelFeedback.title: 2. Model Feedback
modelFeedback.description: The AI will ask you some follow up questions to help you clarify the research direction.
modelFeedback.noQuestions: The model did not return any follow-up questions.

webBrowsing.title: 3. Web Browsing
webBrowsing.description: The AI will then search the web based on our research goal, and iterate until the depth is reached.
webBrowsing.clickToView: Click a child node to view details.

startNode.label: Start
startNode.description: This is the beginning of your deep research journey!

researchReport.title: 4. Research Report
researchReport.downloadingFonts: Downloading necessary fonts, this may take some time...

error.requestBlockedByCORS: The current API provider may not allow cross-origin requests. Please try a different service provider or contact the provider for support.
